CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Sun Certified Web Component Developer (SCWCD) WebSphere

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Srinivas Vangala has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 11 years. Currently he is employed as a Senior Application Developer at ETS. Srinivas has extensive knowledge of Java Server Pages, XML, JavaScript, HTML, Oracle PL/SQL, DHTML, Document Object Model, Cascading Style Sheets, Java, JDBC, Web Services, SAX, XHTML, WSDL, SQL, Lotus Notes/Domino, Hibernate, Enterprise Java Beans, ECLiPSe, CVS, Spring Framework, SOAP, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, JavaServer Faces, Java Servlets, AJAX, JUnit, JDK, IBM WebSphere, XSLT, Sybase, Jboss, Rational ClearCase, Linux, Sun Solaris, SDLC, Oracle 9i, Ant, Struts Web Application Framework, Oracle 8i, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server, Log4j, Java Messaging Service, JSTL, JNDI, GUI Applications, DB2, UML/OMT, Rapid Application Development RAD, Oracle Report, Mariant Tracker, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, JAXB, HttpUnit, Apache Axis, UDDI, Spring ORM, Rational Rose, Oracle, MyEclipise, Macromedia Dreamweaver, MVC, Linux Red Hat, LDAP, JavaMail API, IntelliJ IDEA, Embedded SQL, Data Access Object, Apache WEB Server, AIX UNIX, shell scripting, XQuery, XPath, WebSphere MQ, WebLogic Workshop, WeSphere, VSS, Springs 2.0, Spring WebMvc, Soap UI, Relational Database, Rational ClearQuest, Provisioning, ProVision, PeopleSoft, Oracle Toad, Oracle 11g, Java Objects, Glass Fish, Custom Tags, Class Diagrams, Apache Subversion, Apache Commons Digester, Agile Methodology, Agile, Activity Diagrams. So far Srinivas has not gained any managerial experience.
